tablerow.td: Dying. They will be dead at the end of the next round unless someone intervenes. If all else fails they can make a final Std 2d8 roll for divine intervention, on a 16 some god spares them for reasons that the god will make known to the character at some time in the near future. If successful the character gains an aspect reflecting their obligation to this deity.
Maimed. Suffers some permanent disability, They have lost an eye or a hand, their face has been badly burned etc. Gain the Checked condition and 1d6 hit points.
Bleeding Out Fast. Roll again next round with a -2 cummulative modifier.
Bleeding Out. Roll again next round with a -1 cummulative modifier.
Out Cold. The character gets the Unconscious condition.
It doesn't look good. Roll again next round.
I think he's coming around. Roll again next round with a +1 cummulative modifier.
Where am I?. Character gains the Dazed condition and the Checked condition.
Tis But A Flesh Wound. Heals to 1 health and the gains the Dazed condition.
Never Been Better. Heals 5 health and gets an additional 10 temporary health.
